actions.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Governmental Affairs.

official_title: A bill for the relief of certain Government physicians who were paid basic pay, performance awards, and physicians comparability allowances in aggregate amounts exceeding the limitation set forth in section 5383 (b) of title 5, United States Code.

summary.text: Provides for a limited waiver of the executive level pay cap for 13 Government physicians.

titles.title: A bill for the relief of certain Government physicians who were paid basic pay, performance awards, and physicians comparability allowances in aggregate amounts exceeding the limitation set forth in section 5383 (b) of title 5, United States Code.
